title: MOTIONLESS IN WHITE, KNOCKED LOOSE, WAGE WAR & More Booked For ShipRocked 2026
description: Plus Avatar, Suicidal Tendencies, Kittie, and more! The post MOTIONLESS IN WHITE, KNOCKED LOOSE, WAGE WAR & More Booked For ShipRocked 2026 appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
excerpt: Plus Avatar, Suicidal Tendencies, Kittie, and more!
text: ShipRocked 2026 will set sail between January 25 and 31, 2026 aboard the Carnival Horizon from Miami to Half Moon Cay, Celebration Key–Carnival's soon to be opened private cruise port on the island of Grand Bahama–and Nassau in The Bahamas. The cruise features headliners Halestorm, Motionless In White, and Knocked Loose alongside Suicidal Tendencies, Avatar, Starset, Kittie, and more! The full lineup is: Motionless In White Knocked Loose Wage War AWOLNATION Suicidal Tendencies Avatar Starset Sleep Theory From Ashes To New Kittie '68 Archetypes Collide aurorawave The Barbarians of California Dead Poet Society DeathByRomy Dinosaur Pile-Up The Funeral Portrait Holy Wars House Of Protection Lowlives Not Enough Space Shepherd's Reign UnityTX Zero 9:36 The Stowaways Halestorm said: "We are so proud to announce the return of the Storm to ShipRocked! Halestorm, that is! Get freaky…pack your shit and bring your horns…and get wet and wild with us on the final night of ShipRocked!" Chris Motionless of Motionless In White added: "We can't believe ShipRocked is trusting us to co-captain this rig, but god damn The Pirates of the Caribbean are gonna look like a joke when we're done with it. Very honored to be back at sea with our ShipRocked family!" Tickets are available here. Want More Metal? html:
ShipRocked 2026 will set sail between January 25 and 31, 2026 aboard the Carnival Horizon from Miami to Half Moon Cay, Celebration Key–Carnival's soon to be opened private cruise port on the island of Grand Bahama–and Nassau in The Bahamas.

The cruise features headliners Halestorm, Motionless In White, and Knocked Loose alongside Suicidal Tendencies, Avatar, Starset, Kittie, and more! The full lineup is:

  • Motionless In White
  • Knocked Loose
  • Wage War
  • AWOLNATION
  • Suicidal Tendencies
  • Avatar
  • Starset
  • Sleep Theory
  • From Ashes To New
  • Kittie
  • '68
  • Archetypes Collide
  • aurorawave
  • The Barbarians of California
  • Dead Poet Society
  • DeathByRomy
  • Dinosaur Pile-Up
  • The Funeral Portrait
  • Holy Wars
  • House Of Protection
  • Lowlives
  • Not Enough Space
  • Shepherd's Reign
  • UnityTX
  • Zero 9:36
  • The Stowaways

Halestorm said: "We are so proud to announce the return of the Storm to ShipRocked! Halestorm, that is! Get freaky…pack your shit and bring your horns…and get wet and wild with us on the final night of ShipRocked!"

Chris Motionless of Motionless In White added: "We can't believe ShipRocked is trusting us to co-captain this rig, but god damn The Pirates of the Caribbean are gonna look like a joke when we're done with it. Very honored to be back at sea with our ShipRocked family!"

Tickets are available here.
